content: This is the discussion topic for the talk Nested wiring diagrams in Semagrams.
The mad lads actually did it, this is the diagram editor we've dreamed about since ACT0

This was the ideal applied category theory talk, which both contained the word "endobicomodule" and "Kan extension along the Yoneda embedding", but also went into an uncomfortable amount of detail about what happens on every draw frame during a click-and-drag action :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:

Jules Hedges said:

This was the ideal applied category theory talk, which both contained the word "endobicomodule" and "Kan extension along the Yoneda embedding", but also went into an uncomfortable amount of detail about what happens on every draw frame during a click-and-drag action :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:

We call this full stack mathematics
